categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: Bravo Squad was a squad of clone cadets that underwent training on Kamino. They were selected as potential ARC trooper candidates by ARC Commander Colt after they successfully ran the Citadel Challenge.

All of the members were clones of Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett, that were born on the planet Kamino to fight in the Grand Army of the Republic. Around 21 BBY, during the Clone Wars they were fighting in their last practice tests under the supervision of Siniteen Sergeant Bric and the Arconan El-Les. The members of Bravo Squad perfected the Citadel Challenge, running it in, as ARC Commander Colt called it, ARC Trooper time.
